# Task ID: 6
# Title: Cashu Wallet Integration
# Status: pending
# Dependencies: None
# Priority: high
# Description: Implement auto-generated ecash wallet with send/receive/zap functionality using the cashu-ts SDK and NIP-60/61 standards.
# Details:
1. Install cashu-ts SDK: `npm install cashu-ts`
2. Create WalletManager service:
```typescript
class WalletManager {
  initializeWallet(): Promise<void> {}
  getBalance(): Promise<number> {}
  send(amount: number, recipient: string): Promise<boolean> {}
  receive(token: string): Promise<boolean> {}
  zap(amount: number, recipient: string): Promise<boolean> {}
  getMintInfo(): Promise<any> {}
}
```
3. Implement NIP-60/61 for wallet operations
4. Create wallet UI components:
   - Balance display
   - Send form
   - Receive screen with QR
   - Transaction history
5. Implement secure storage for tokens
6. Add zap functionality for posts and users
7. Implement group donation button tied to group wallet
8. Add transaction notifications
9. Implement mint configuration via NIP-60 tags

# Test Strategy:
1. Test wallet initialization and balance retrieval
2. Verify send/receive functionality with test tokens
3. Test zap functionality
4. Validate secure storage of tokens
5. Test group donation functionality
6. Verify compliance with NIP-60/61 specifications
7. Test transaction history accuracy
